scored.prompt: I have a clear aim for the next 12 months.
My daily choices align with my values.
My self-talk is encouraging and honest.
I feel physically energized most days.
My sleep and restoration habits are consistent.
I know my essential numbers (income, how much I spend).
I maintain a savings/backup that keeps me calm.
I invest regularly in my growth or long-term priorities.
Most of my close relationships lift my energy.
I address tensions with care and clarity.
I have mentors/allies who challenge and support me.
I can return to calm quickly when triggered.
I notice feelings without being ruled by them.
My attention goes to priorities, not noise.
My environment reduces distractions by design.

reflective.prompt: Who has made a lasting impact on your life? Why did they shift your path?
If nothing could stop me, I would finally _____________.
